thig2.7:4.1: I rejoice in the host of gods,
thig2.7:4.4: on the fourteenth and the fifteenth days,
thig2.7:5.1: and the eighth day of the fortnight,
thig2.7:5.2: as well as on the fortnightly special displays.
thig2.7:5.3: Today I eat just once a day,
thig2.7:5.4: my head is shaven, I wear the outer robe.
thig2.7:5.5: I don’t long for the host of gods,
thig2.7:5.6: for stress has been removed from my heart.
